nodes.text: Tramsig's Plan is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on December 9, 2004 in the form of a broadcast by Yara Grugara of a conversation between Admiral Jir Tramsig and an unidentified individual in which Tramsig threatened to "kill them […] all of them." This was followed by statements from the Almas Academy, Governor Chistor and Senior Counselor Impeveri, the Cularin Militia, and Senator Wren.
